burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.actorcritic

Interface Critic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TDLambda, TimeIndexedTDLambda

    public interface Critic
    This interface provides the methods necessary for implementing the critic part of an actor-critic learning algorithm. The critic is responsible for observing behavior and returning a critique of that behavior. The interface also provides methods for telling the critic when an episode starts and ends.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double critique(EnvironmentOutcome eo)
      This method's implementation provides the critique for some specific instance of the behavior.
      void endEpisode()
      This method is called whenever a learning episode terminates
      void reset()
      Used to reset any data that was created/modified during learning so that learning can be begin anew.
      void startEpisode(State s)
      This method is called whenever a new learning episode begins

    • Method Detail

      • startEpisode

        void startEpisode(State s)
        This method is called whenever a new learning episode begins
        Parameters:
        s - the initial state of the new learning episode

      • endEpisode

        void endEpisode()
        This method is called whenever a learning episode terminates

      • critique

        double critique(EnvironmentOutcome eo)
        This method's implementation provides the critique for some specific instance of the behavior. This method may modify this critic, so that subsequent calls with the same EnvironmentOutcome can produce different critiques.
        Parameters:
        eo - the EnvironmentOutcome specifying the event
        Returns:
        the critique of this behavior.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Used to reset any data that was created/modified during learning so that learning can be begin anew.
